chunkName.description: Chunk name to put restriction on

jsSize.description: Specify restriction on number of bytes JS chunks can be, accepted format Bytes, KiB, MB only

cssSize.description: Specify restriction on number of bytes CSS chunks can be, accepted format Bytes, KiB, MB only

logType.description: Specify the default way to treat all the restriction checks at chunk level, overrides the default behaviour

logMessageFormat.description: Used to customize log message format, overrides defaultLogMessageFormat

restrictions.description: Match and execute these restrictions when its schema is matched

defaultLogType.description: Specify the default way to treat all the restriction checks

defaultLogMessageFormat.description: Used to customize log message format for all the restrictions

enableInfoLogs.description: Used to log info of all the chunk(s) who met the restrictions defined
